Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart

Class SmartWebDriver

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.decorators.WebDriverDecorator
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext, org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver
public class SmartWebDriver extends WebDriverDecorator
A custom wrapper for WebDriver that enhances element handling, adds exception management, and provides built-in support for Shadow DOM elements.

It integrates with Selenium functions while allowing configuration-based handling of standard and shadow root elements.

Author:
Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
